talk.author: did:plc:gg7eowb5bhs32coftdxnq2if
talk.utter:
It can be sketchy and interesting and more all at the same time. How would you judge if it had worked? And yeah the cutoff question - how much time needs to pass?

Do you think copyright rules likely to change much in light of all this?

talk.author: did:plc:ieipici6is42y7e6r2cvk4x2
talk.utter:
There has to be some clarification of fair use, one way or another.

I was listening, when you replied earlier, to the new Spotify full-cast dramatisation of 'The Mysterious at Styles' produced "with the permission of Agatha Christie ltd."

talk.author: did:plc:gg7eowb5bhs32coftdxnq2if
talk.utter: Wondering whether I would prefer to be posthumously represented by an “ltd” or “llm”…
